name: WP Restaurant Price List
author: ThemenintheBox.com - WordPressGuru.it

sections.description:
TRY DEMO | PRO VERSION PLUGIN

A simple plugin that helps you show the price list of your business thanks to its visual interface you can enter both the titles of the categories (of sales items), and the name and description of the items in addition to the price.
You can use it to create the menu of your restaurant, pub or brewery, or simply to enter the price list of any business.

This plugin is meant for all website owners who need to show their price list, plus it can be easily implemented by website developers who need to give a simple interface to site managers (who are not familiar with WordPress).

WP Restaurant Price list allows you to easily manage the price lists of restaurants or businesses, thanks to its drag and drop interface.

WHAT TO EXPECT FROM THE PLUGIN

  • Adding price lists quickly and easily
  • Custom Currency Symbol
  • Custom Decimal and Thousands separator
  • Display/Hide Decimal Numbers
  • 2 layout templates
  • Compatible with Guthemberg

Pro version

  • Infinite Lists and Items (pro)
  • 5 layout templates (pro)
  • Personalized appearance (pro)
  • Lightbox pop up (pro)
  • Allergens Section (pro)
  • Products variants (pro)
  • Google Fonts (pro)

Not only Restaurant!

  • Spas & Salons
  • Barber Shop
  • Retail Businesses
  • Graphic and Web Designers
  • Travel & Tourism
  • Massage studios
  • Photographers
  • Wedding Planner
  • Much more

How does it work

WP Restaurant Price List allows you to create a price list and add it to your site pages using the shortcode [wprpl]

You can choose between two types of layouts, with and without photo preview.

WP Restaurant Price List involves the use of categories to divide the price list.

In the pro version it is also possible to change the appearance of the price list, changing the font family, colors and size of the fonts.

Also in the pro version it is possible to insert the allergen table mandatory in many countries for food products.

Instructions

  • Install the plugin from the WordPress repository
  • Activate the plugin from the plugin menu of your dashboard
  • Go to Settings > WP Restaurant Price List and create your price list
  • Enter the shortcode in your page or post

Shortcode

[wprpl]

Authors

  • Theme in the Box – project idea – Themeinthebox.com
  • WpGuru – code development – WordPressGuru.it
  • Marco Dedo – project management – MarcoDedo.it

Credits

  • Icons made by Flaticon
  • Graphics pikisuperstar – freepik.com
sections.installation:
To install WP Restaurant Price List, follow these steps:

  1. Download and unzip the plugin
  2. Upload wp-restaurant-price-list.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Settings > WP Restaurant Price List and create your price list
  5. Enter the shortcode [wprpl] in your page or post
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin with any WordPress theme?

Yup! WP Restaurant Price List automatically adapts its style to that of your WordPress theme, in order to integrate perfectly.

How do I insert the price list on my pages?

You can enter the shortcode [wprpl] in your page or post

Is this plugin compatible with Gutenberg?

Sure! You can safely use the Shortcode widget present by default in Gutemberg

Is there any way to insert multiple price lists in different pages / posts?

You can try the PRO version of the plugin, here you will find all the information

sections.reviews:
The best menu management plugin

By machaddict on December 7, 2022

The most flexible and adaptable menu management plugin for various needs. Another plus not to be outdone, the fastest and most efficient support I have encountered in 15 years

Easily create price lists for your restaurant business

By deanpaola on June 1, 2022

WP Restaurant Price List is a great plugin that helps you easily create price lists for your restaurant business. It has a very user-friendly visual interface, which makes it easy to enter the titles of the categories you want to include on your price list. This plugin is great for anyone looking for an easy way to create a price list for their restaurant business.

Beautiful and Useful

By Antonio Junior (cromialab) on May 25, 2020

Really well done plugin. Useful in these times to eliminate the paper menu in restaurants. The premium version is truly excellent.

Income plugin

By fasinatosin12356 on April 13, 2020

Absolutely brilliant. This is often helping me to realize excellent income. Many thanks for this perfect plug-in.

Awesome plugin

By hennyadeoye12356 on April 13, 2020

Wonderful awesome menu plugin with a great features, working perfectly on my client website. Thanks for the great work.

best plugin for business website

By enterprisehenny on April 12, 2020

I have been trying to find how to display a catering menu, but none of the opposite menu plugins fit my needs. I used to be trying to find specific menu options also as wells wrote and responsive code.

simplest plugin

By jamemoses on April 12, 2020

This is hands-down the simplest plugin you'll use for a simple menu. Takes just a few short minutes to configure. It also has a great response to questions for the support!

excellent plugin

By opeyemi12345 on April 12, 2020

Not only it's simple and straightforward to create menus with this plugin but its real beauty is that the way it's been coded, with good thoughts out filters to ease custom displays of the menus.

Nice plugin

By hemeintheox on April 8, 2020

Nice plugin, simple and quickly to use

Missing Basics

By avtechies on April 2, 2020

I use Beaver Builder on my site. This plugin has potential. Problems I encountered are: 1. Regular version only has the comma as the decimal separator, cannot choose a period unless you purchase the premium version which doesn't seem to exist yet. 2. The text has a shadow box around it. Can't get rid of it in the plugin settings. 3. Not enough levels (only 2) for our restaurant's needs. For example: Lunch > Appetizers > Tacos

short_description: Show your price list with the description and cost of the items, divided by categories.
